full_prompt:

They are standing in a professional V-formation on the platform.

- elegant corporate with warm wood tones and gold trim professional studio

- Luxurious deluxe wheel with gold and silver accents featuring brand name positioned centrally between the two smart screens

- 'Prize2Pride' brand logo prominently and delicately displayed on both smart screens

- Right screen: displaying multilingual content in Arabic, Thai, Polish

- All hosts are exceptionally attractive with perfect symmetrical features

- Professional broadcast-quality environment
- Sophisticated color grading with rich, vibrant tones
